001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticFactory;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Matrices;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedMatrix;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
009
010@StaticUtility
011public final class FeatureMatrices {
012
013    private FeatureMatrices() {
014    }
015
016    @StaticFactory
017    public static <N extends Number> TypedMatrix<N> create(FeatureExtractor<N> featureExtractor, DataSet<N> dataSet) {
018        N[][] cells = featureExtractor.getTypeSupport().createArrayOfArrays(dataSet.size(), featureExtractor.featureCount() + 1);
019        for (int i = 0; i < cells.length; i++) {
020            N x = dataSet.samples().get(i).features().get(0);
021            Array<N> features = featureExtractor.extractFeatures(x);
022            cells[i][0] = featureExtractor.getTypeSupport().one();
023            for (int j = 0; j < features.length(); j++) {
024                cells[i][j + 1] = features.get(j);
025            }
026        }
027        return Matrices.create(cells, featureExtractor.getTypeSupport());
028    }
029
030}
